source:
storage_acc = mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account') # ends in / 
linked_service = "ls_storage"
db_name = "odw_standardised_db"

raw_container = "abfss://temp-sap-hr-data@" + storage_acc
raw_source_folder = ""
raw_name = "Addresses - 20221107_chris_changes.xlsx"

delta_lake_table_name = "addresses"
standardised_container = 'abfss://odw-standardised@' + storage_acc
standardised_source_folder = "HR/" + delta_lake_table_name + "/"
standardised_name = raw_name.split(".xlsx")[0] + '.snappy.parquet'


sheet_name = 0
header_row = 0

validate_parameters(storage_acc, raw_container, raw_source_folder, raw_name, standardised_container, standardised_source_folder, standardised_name, linked_service, sheet_name=0, header_row=0)
ingest_excel_to_parquet(storage_acc, raw_container, raw_source_folder, raw_name, standardised_container, standardised_source_folder, standardised_name, linked_service)
enable_delta_on_parquet(standardised_container, standardised_source_folder)
lakedb_table_sparksql(db_name,delta_lake_table_name,standardised_container, standardised_source_folder)
